mapper.select: SELECT t1.START_TIME_ AS send_time, t1.END_TIME_ AS complete_time, t1.DURATION_ AS duration, t2.user_name AS assignee, t3.action AS action, t3.`content` as comment, t1.ID_ AS task_id, t1.task_def_key_ AS task_code FROM act_hi_taskinst t1 LEFT JOIN t_user t2 ON t1.ASSIGNEE_ = t2.id right JOIN t_flow_opinion t3 ON t1.ID_ = t3.task_id WHERE t1.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL and PROC_INST_ID_=#{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by complete_time desc
